Rule.name: AllowedValues-Location-UsingCustom
Rule.Description: This Allowed Values Rule uses a Custom configuration object that is loaded into IdentityIQ. The Custom object is called "Location"

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: form
Argument.Description: The Form object for the provisioning plan.

Argument.name: value
Argument.Description: An Obect (possibly a Collection) of the allowed values for the given field.
